description.name: Hetzner Cloud
description.short: Hetzner Cloud module enables bridge between your WHMCS instane with Hetzner Cloud Console portal for ease of use and automation of cloud instances.
description.long:
This module can be used to auto provisioning of Hetzner Cloud instances. 

This module supports the following actions at provisioning time:

* Instant Activation of Cloud Server on Payment received
* Automatic Suspension/ Unsuspension/ Termination of the VM
* Supports Unlimited Hetzner Project accounts
* View Bandwidth Usages/ Rescue Mode Password/ noVNC Console
* Power On/Power Off/Reboot/Hard Reset Server
* Volume/ IP/ OS Rebuild/ ISO/ Backup Management

In all cases, in addition to the itemised action, it will also allow other automations such as Set Reverse DNS and many other features.

[Learn more »](https://www.license.co.id/whmcs-addons/whmcs-module/)
